DOC.detailed_description: The EUropean trial free LIght chain removal exTEnded haemodialysis cast nephropathy ( EuLITE ) trial prospective , randomise , multicentre , open label clinical trial investigate clinical benefit FLC removal haemodialysis patient cast nephropathy , dialysis dependent renal failure de novo multiple myeloma . Recruitment commence May 2008 , total 90 patient recruit . Participants randomise , centrally , upon enrolment , either trial chemotherapy FLC removal haemodialysis trial chemotherapy standard high flux haemodialysis . Trial chemotherapy modify PAD regime , consist bortezomib , doxorubicin dexamethasone . FLC removal haemodialysis undertaken use two Gambro HCO 1100 dialysers series , intensive treatment schedule . The primary outcome study independence dialysis 3 month . Secondary outcome : duration dialysis , reduction serum FLC concentration ; myeloma response survival .
